document.full_text: hamas leader khaled meshaal said on monday the united states had no right to kill osama bin laden but said this did not mean the palestinian islamist group supported al qaeda's attacks on civilians.
document.title: hamas's meshaal: u.s. had no right to kill bin laden
lines_and_colors: hamas leader khaled meshaal said on monday the united states had no right to kill osama bin laden but said this did not mean the palestinian islamist group supported al qaeda's attacks on civilians.
